name: Gunpowder Farmer
description:
Shoot your way into great harvest in this fast paced farming FPS

Farm with your trusty revolver. Plant seeds by shooting fertile ground and harvest by shooting grown plants.

More points for shooting grown plants and bonus for shooting while moving or in the air

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Left click to fire
  • SPACE to jump (you have double jump)

Game for Minijam 61 with constraint of combining two 2 conflicting ideas. Here its done with combining fast paced FPS game play with farming game.
